message:
"German Recruiter" Vacancy.

Job Description:
-Upload job announcements in various media and employment fairs
-Develop a pool of qualified candidates in advance of need
-Build networks to find qualified passive candidates
-Conduct phone screening in a professional and presentable manner
-Interview applicants for initial screening
-Perform all data entry and proper filling system to keep a qualified candidates database

Requirements & Specifications:
- Excellent Command of German is a must
- English is an asset
- Excellent knowledge of MS Office
- Human resources certificate or Diploma will be an asset
- Excellent Communication Skills
- Very Good Organization Skills
- Time Management Skills
- Stress Management skills
Please if you see that you have the above requirements do not hesitate to send your C.V to mohamed_ali_nassar@hotmail.com
